description: Travel Addendum Data of the transaction - addendumType = TRVL

departureDate.description: Date of departure for the first leg of travel

issueDate.description: Date when the ticket was issued to the ticket holder

numberOfLegs.description: Number of city pairs included on the ticket

passengerName.description: Name of the person to whom the ticked was issued

segments.description: Travel segments - only available if schema 'addendumDetails' or 'travelDetails' is provided

travelAgencyName.description: Name of the travel agency that booked the ticket

conjunctionId.description: ID for a ticket that contains an itinerary that is more than four segments

domestic.description: Indicates whether the the travel is domestic

electronicTicket.description: Indicates whether the ticket is an e-ticket

endorsements.description: Describes the fare issued by the airline

exchangedTicketNumber.description: Number of the new ticket which replaces the original ticket

restrictionsApply.description: Identifier noting ticket purchased has some restriction associated with its use

travelAgencyInvoiceNumber.description: Invoice number assigned by the travel agency that booked the ticket

travelAgencyCode.description: Code assigned to the travel agency that booked the ticket
